albania.notes:
Temporary visa exemption from 1 April to 31 October 2018.
Visa-free entry for up to 90 days for valid USA, United Kingdom or a Schengen Member State ('C' or 'D' visa) visa holders.

angola.notes:
Visitors who have been granted an online pre-visa are then issued with a visa on arrival at Luanda International Airport.
For a maximum total stay of 90 days within a one year period.

australia_and_territories.notes: May apply online (Online Visitor e600 visa).

azerbaijan.notes:
90 days within any 180-day period
If staying more than 10 days passengers visiting relatives must register with local police. If staying in a hotel, this will be arranged by the hotel.
Who are of Armenian descent Government of Azerbaijan bans the entry.

bahrain.notes:
Visas can be issued on arrival for a stay up to 1 month.
Visa can be extended for an additional two weeks.
eVisa issued for 14 days, extendable once.

bangladesh.notes: Visitors can apply to extend their stay when in the country.

belize.notes: 90 days for valid Schengen Member State visa or multi-entry USA visa holders.

benin.notes: Must have an international vaccination certificate.

bhutan.notes:
Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.
Visitors are required to book with a registered tour operator in Bhutan.

botswana.notes: Extension to the visa-free period must be applied for in advance.

bulgaria.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period for holders 'C' visa issued by Croatia, Cyprus, Romania or a Schengen Member State.

burundi.notes: Passengers holding an entry authorisation letter from the authorities may obtain a visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 1 month.

cameroon.notes:
May apply online.
Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

chad.notes: Visitors holding an 'entry authorisation' letter can pick up a visa on arrival.

chile.notes: Extension of stay possible for additional 90 days.

china.notes:
Visa not required for 30 days for travelling as part of an accredited tour group.
72-hour visit without a visa when in transit at Changsha, Chengdu, Chongqing, Guangzhou, Guilin, Harbin, Kunming, Qingdao, Wuhan, Xi'an and Xiamen.144-hours visit without a visa when in transit through Beijing Capital International Airport, Dalian, Hangzhou, Shijiazhuang Zhengding International Airport in Hebei, Nanjing, Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport and Shanghai Pudong International Airport, Shanghai Railway Station and the Port of Shanghai); Shenyang and Tianjin Binhai International Airport
Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan do count as third countries under the 72 and 144-hours visa-free visit transit policy.
May visit Suifenhe without a visa for up to 15 days if travelling with at least one companion.
Residents of Amur Oblast may visit Heihe without a visa for a day.

colombia.notes: Extendable up to 180-day stay within a one-year period.

côte_d'ivoire.notes: eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

croatia.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period for valid Bulgaria, Romania, Cyprus or a Schengen Member State ('C', a double or multiple) visa holders.

cuba.notes: Visa waiver agreement for 90 days within any 180-day period was signed 22 May 2018 but not yet ratified.

cyprus.notes:
Pro-Visa issued online free of charge valid for 90 per 180 days in a year (single entry).[citation needed] Paper multi-visa 'C' is free as well.[citation needed]
90 days within any 180-day period for valid Bulgaria, Croatia, Romania or a Schengen Member State visa holders.

djibouti.notes: Visa on arrival also available at Djibouti–Ambouli International Airport until 30 April 2018.

dominica.notes: 6 months for valid Canada, USA, United Kingdom or a Schengen Member State visa holders.

egypt.notes:
eVisa issued for 30 days.
Extension of stay is possible.
Visa free for tourists arriving at Sharm El Sheik, Saint Catherine or Taba airports and remaining in the Sinai resorts for a maximum stay of 15 days.

el_salvador.notes: Extension of stay is possible for 90 days.

eritrea.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

ethiopia.notes: Visa on arrival only at Addis Ababa Bole International Airport.

gabon.notes: eVisa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

ghana.notes: Pre-arranged emergency visa can be picked up on arrival.

guatemala.notes: Extension of stay is possible for 90 days.

india.notes:
e-Visa holders must arrive via 25 designated airports[Note 1] or 3 designated seaports.[Note 2]
An Indian e-Tourist Visa can only be obtained twice in one calendar year.

indonesia.notes: Not available at all entry points.

iran.notes: Available at Qeshm, Kish, Mashhad, Isfahan, Shiraz, Tabriz and Tehran airports.

ireland.notes: Visa waiver for UK 'C' visa holders until October 2021. Entry permitted only if first point of entry to the Common Travel Area is in the UK.

kenya.notes: Can also be entered on an East Africa Tourist Visa issued by Rwanda or Uganda.

south_korea.notes: A maximum total stay of 90 days within any 180-day period.

kuwait.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

latvia.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period for holders of border traffic permit.

lebanon.notes:
1 month extendable for 2 additional months.
Granted free of charge at Beirut International Airport or any other port of entry if there is no Israeli visa or seal, holding a telephone number, an address in Lebanon, and a non refundable return or circle trip ticket.

liberia.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

libya.notes: Due to safety concerns, Russian government advises its citizens not to visit Libya.

macedonia.notes:
90 days within any 6-month period
Without a voucher and an invitation/letter of guarantee until 15 March 2019.

maldives.notes: Extension of stay for 60 days is possible.

mexico.notes:
Electronic permit gives the right to enter the country only by air.
180 days for valid Canada, Japan, USA, United Kingdom or a Schengen Member State visa holders.

montenegro.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period from 15 April to 31 October 2018.

mozambique.notes:
Available at Beira, Nampula, Maputo, Pemba, Tete and Vilankulo airports.
Extension of stay for 30 days is possible.

myanmar.notes:
eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports or via land border crossings with Thailand — Tachileik, Myawaddy and Kawthaung.
eVisa is available for tourism and business purposes.

namibia.notes: 3 months within one calendar year period

nepal.notes:
Extension of stay is possible of up to 150 days.
Business travellers can obtain a visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 5 years, subject to a fee and a license issued by the Ministry of Industry.

new_zealand.notes: May apply online, electronic visa is available.

nicaragua.notes:
Tourist card must be obtained on arrival, subject to a fee.
Extension of stay is possible.

nigeria.notes:
May apply online.
Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

norway.notes: 15 days for holders of border traffic permit.

pakistan.notes: Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days. Conditions apply.

philippines.notes:
A visa on arrival is available for a maximum stay of 59 days.
Extension of stay is only possible for those who obtained a visa on arrival, to a maximum of 1 year.

romania.notes: 90 days within any 180-day period for valid Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus or a Schengen Member State ('C', a double or multiple) visa holders.

rwanda.notes:
A visa on arrival is available for 30 days.
Can also be entered on an East Africa Tourist Visa issued by Kenya or Uganda.

sierra_leone.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

singapore.notes: Some provisions for 96 hours visa-free transit.

solomon_islands.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

somalia.notes: Due to safety concerns, Russian government advises its citizens not to visit Somalia.

south_africa.notes: Extension of stay possible for an additional 90 days.

sri_lanka.notes: Extension of stay possible for an additional 150 days.

sudan.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

swaziland.notes: Extension of stay possible for a maximum of 90 days in total.

syria.notes: Due to safety concerns, Russian government advises its citizens not to visit Syria.

timor-leste.notes:
Visa on arrival is only available at the Presidente Nicolau Lobato International Airport or at the Dili Sea Port.
Extension of stay possible for up to 90 days.

tonga.notes: Extension of stay for a further 5 months is possible.

turkey.notes: A maximum total stay of 90 days within any 180-day period.

turkmenistan.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

uganda.notes:
May apply online.
Can also be entered on an East Africa Tourist Visa issued by Kenya or Rwanda.

united_arab_emirates.notes:
Visa is issued free of charge.
Extension of stay is possible for a further 30 days.
Visa waiver agreement for 90 days within any 180-day period was signed on 6 July 2018 and it is yet to come into force.

united_kingdom_and_crown_dependencies.notes: 24-hours visa-free visit: 1) when in transit to/from Australia, Canada, New Zealand or USA, or 2) if holder of residence permit issued by Australia, Canada, New Zealand or USA, or 3) if holder of certain EEA or Switzerland visas, or 4) if holder of certain Irish visas

uruguay.notes: Extension of stay possible for additional 90 days.

venezuela.notes: Extension of stay is possible for a further 90 days.

vietnam.notes:
30 day visa free on Phú Quốc.
A single entry eVisa valid for 30 days is also available.

zambia.notes:
For those travelling to Zambia for business, the maximum stay is 30 days in any one-year period.
Tourists are allowed 90 days in any one-year period.
Also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zimbabwe; also eligible for e-Visa.

zimbabwe.notes:
For those travelling to Zimbabwe for business, a visa on arrival can also be issued for a maximum stay of 30 days.
Also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zambia; also eligible for e-Visa.
